body.name: Farberware Glide Deep Nonstick Frying Pan / Fry Pan / Skillet with Helper Handle - 12.5 Inch, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 32 mins
features: PERFORMANCE COOKWARE FROM FARBERWARE: Frying pan is constructed from durable ceramic on aluminum engineering for quick, even heat distribution and long lasting reliability.
SUPERIOR NONSTICK FRYING PAN : Skillet features CopperSlide technology for superior copper ceramic nonstick food release and easy cleanup
EASY TO CLEAN SKILLET: Frying pan is dishwasher safe for easy cleaning
STURDY AND COMFORTABLE: Easy-hold handle for a comfortable, confident grip, frying pan is equipped with helper handle to move pan from station to station throughout kitchen
TAKES THE HEAT: Frying pan is oven safe to 350°F
body.description: Sizzle and sear with superior ceramic nonstick when cooking with the Farberware Glide Copper Ceramic Nonstick 12.5-Inch Frying Pan with Helper Handle. Constructed from fast and even-heating aluminum, this versatile frying pan boasts CopperSlide technology for effortless nonstick food release and easy cleanup. The copper ceramic nonstick is dishwasher safe for quick cleaning, and an easy-hold fry pan handle provides a comfortable, confident grip to flip, fry, and saute with ease. Oven safe to 350°F for cooktop to oven versatility, the frying pan features a flared rim that makes it easy to pour out cooking sauces and liquids, and is backed by Farberware's hassle-free, no worries lifetime warranty. For great performance and long-lasting durability, reach for the Farberware Glide Copper Ceramic Nonstick 12.5-Inch Frying Pan with Helper Handle and CopperSlide technology.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and reliable
reviews.reviewText: This is so perfect to cook with! Nothing sticks, it's easy to clean, and heats evenly. No complaints!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy Farberware pots and pans and you will have them for a lifetime!
reviews.reviewText: Farberware brand has been synonymous in our family for as long as I can remember. My mother had Farberware, my sister and I have Farberware and our children will ALL have Farberware products in their households. I even snagged all my mother’s Farberware pots when she passed away and still use them to this day. I just bought my grandson's wife her first set of Farberware pots and pans for Christmas. She called me immediately when she opened the huge box I sent to her in Canada and she couldn't stop screaming with delight over her new pots and pans because of the quality, the shape of the handle, and the ease of cooking with them. Yes, she had already started cooking in them when she called me. I bought her a starter set - one 0.625 quarts, Stainless Steel Butter Warmer/Small Saucepan, two 1-quart, two 2-quart, two 3-quart Non-stick Pan/with lid, one 16-quart stock pot/with lid, one Glide Deep Nonstick Frying Pan-12.5 inch, and one Glide Ceramic Nonstick Saute Pan with lid and Helper Handle 4-quart. I know what all of you are thinking right now – that this was an expensive purchase on my part. However, when you have a growing family of five and you want to have the best tools/pots to make the best meals for a lifetime – you buy Farberware. I’m 69 years old and through the years I’ve tried a lot of different brands. I’ve thrown away all the inferior pots and pans (or sold them for pennies on the dollar in garage sales) that advertisers have said were better. I now have nothing but Farberware in my kitchen cabinets for superior-quality cooking and ease of cleanup. So, if you want a “work-horse” set of pots and pans that will stand the test of time – buy Farberware – I highly recommend them. - enough said!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This cooking vessel is worth adding to your kitchen menagerie. I have had large covered skillets with good handles opposite each other for two hand lifting before...but THIS skillet goes a step farther...and I love it. One side has the long handle, and on the other a short handle...which gives a solid control when lifting and manipulating the skillet.The versatility of this skillet is sweet. You can prepare anything a Dutch Oven can. Roasts, chicken, turkey, stew and more...all on your stove top...with the same capacity as the Dutch Oven. Cooking is even and does not leave cold spots.The surfaces are well done, smooth, and elegant. Inside, the copper coating insures your food will be harvested easily, it's non-stick coating a lasting feature, if not abused. Proper care will give you cooking ease and joy for years.The lid fits well, and is heavy clear glass... (The top knob gets a tad warm, so use a hotpad or cotton dishcloth to remove the lid. Lol)Cleaning is no trouble. A Scotch Brite scrubbie does the trick, and protects the non-stick coating, yet allows for adequate scrub action for whatever residues you encounter.Breakfast foods can be used in this skillet easily too, but it's large capacity is a bit of an overkill to produce eggs over easy... I would save eggs for a smaller skillet...but bacon is easy.Versitile, practical and durable. All in all, this covered skillet is well worth the price. I would buy it again anytime.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a solid pan
reviews.reviewText: Seems like a good pan, the food really moves around in it nice. The pan doesnt move on the stove like my others do, you have to use something to stir the food, unlike my other pans that you can just kinda slide back and forth- but for the money, seems legit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get one, You won't regret it.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, large size so we can make 4 chicken breasts or 5 small ones at once. It's super easy to clean i rinse with soapy water a soft sponge, rag or even a paper towel. Make sure not to use metal utensils, I use a wooden spoon/spatula or silicone. We are using a glass lid that came with one of our pots and it fits perfectly because I know it would have been twice the price to get one that came with a lid. So it's great if money is tight I've always liked Farberware pans the most. Get one!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new non stick pan since all of mine are old. This one has been great so far. Nothing sticks and the clean up is very easy. Glad I made this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After a couple of months of use, this pan works great. Nothing sticks to it. Eggs, French toast, burgers, etc.. everything slides right out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is the perfect pot for us. Helps heat/cook super fast and super easy to clean

reviews.reviewText: Vengo de una familia que ha tenido restaurantes por generaciones, por lo que sabemos perfectamente utilizar y cuidar cualquier tipo de sartén, quise probar estos Farberger pero solo me duraron 15 días, a los 4 días ya era necesario agregar más aceite y en menos de 15 días ya se le pegaba todo tipo de alimentos, además resultaba casi imposible poder lavarlos y que se les desprendieran los residuos. Por otro lado, se formó una capa ocre oscuro, que no pertenecía a ningún alimento y la cual no desapareció con ningún método de limpieza, por lo que decidí devolver los sartenes. Definitivamente no los recomiendo.
This cookware is truly nonstick and easy to clean. Enjoy using it. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Love that I can strain from the pot, without having to use a strainer.
reviews.reviewText: .Perfect for cooking pasta, and boiling potatoes.
Lo compré apenas hace unos meses y se le pega todo, no recomendable!
